backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend, implementing user profile management, social media post CRUD, metrics tracking, and webhook logging with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features—auto-enabling automation flags on page load in AutomationDashboardPage.tsx and appending new services to seedServices.ts—to their respective files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one- to two-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.) used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'Quick Bee AI Growth Engine', mounting the app at #root and loading the main.tsx module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application file that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (dashboard, leads, services, automation, social, marketing, AI agent pages, etc.) wrapped in a CartProvider and shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/AdCampaignFormMo: Dialog modal component for creating and editing ad campaigns, with fields for campaign name, platform (Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, YouTube), budget, spend, impressions, clicks, and conversions, handling float/bigint conversions on save.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Renders the application sidebar with collapsible navigation groups (main, social media, digital marketing, AI agents) using TanStack Router links and highlights the active route. Also displays a cart item badge on the Checkout link using CartContext.
frontend/src/components/EmailCampaignFor: Modal dialog for creating or editing an email campaign, with fields for name, subject, body, target audience, and status. Pre-populates fields when editing an existing campaign and calls an async onSave callback on submission.
frontend/src/components/LandingPageFormM: Modal dialog for creating or editing a landing page record, with fields for name, URL, associated campaign, conversion goal, and status. Pre-populates fields from an existing LandingPage object when editing.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with the AppSidebar and a main content area rendered via TanStack Router's Outlet, plus a footer with a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/MetricsFormModal: Modal dialog for creating or editing social media metrics entries, with fields for platform, date, and numeric stats (followers, impressions, reach, engagements, clicks, posts published, notes). Converts between nanosecond bigint timestamps and date strings.
frontend/src/components/PostFormModal.ts: Modal dialog for creating or editing a social media post, with fields for title, caption, platform, status, scheduled datetime, tags, and notes. Handles conversion between nanosecond bigint timestamps and datetime-local input strings.
frontend/src/components/SEOEntryFormModa: A modal dialog component for creating or editing SEO entries, with fields for page URL, target keywords, meta title, and meta description including character count warnings.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context provider that manages a shopping cart with localStorage persistence, exposing add, remove, update quantity, and clear operations along with totals.
frontend/src/data/masterPlans.ts: Defines and exports three static pricing plan objects (Spark, Surge, Titan) with names, prices in INR, colors, and feature lists.
frontend/src/data/seedServices.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and exports a static array of seed service records across categories like Social Media, SEO, and Paid Ads with packages and add-ons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for leads, services, and backend entities (social media, ads, SEO, etc.), with leads and services stubbed to local/seed data since they are no longer stored in the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties and reusable component classes (glass cards, teal gradients, status badges, sidebar links) for the dark teal-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdsTrackerPage.tsx: Page for managing paid ad campaigns across platforms (Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, YouTube) with CRUD operations, platform filtering, and KPI summary cards for spend, clicks, CTR, and conversions.
Page component that accepts a keyword input and uses an AI API to generate SEO blog posts, social media captions, LinkedIn posts, and Instagram carousel outlines, with copy and export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AISmartSystemsPage.ts: Page providing multiple AI-powered sales tools (service recommender, proposal generator, pricing strategy, closing scripts, follow-up messages) where users fill in fields and receive AI-generated outputs.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsEnginePage.t: Page that generates GA4-style analytics reports for a selected date range, optionally posting to a webhook and displaying mock KPI cards and charts for sessions, users, revenue, and conversion rate.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationDashboardPa: Displays a dashboard of toggleable automation features (e.g., WhatsApp auto-reply, proposal sending, analytics reporting) with per-toggle state persisted to localStorage. Each automation card shows an icon, category badge, description, and an enable/disable switch.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationWorkflowsPa: Provides a UI to manually trigger predefined automation workflows (new lead, meeting, payment, analytics, content) by POSTing to a configured webhook URL. Shows per-workflow run status (idle/running/success/error) and falls back to a simulated result if no webhook is configured.
frontend/src/pages/CampaignAutopilotPage: Manages campaign autopilot settings including posting windows, health thresholds, and summary schedules for ad campaigns and social posts. Displays campaign health statuses (Healthy/At Risk/Underperforming) based on CTR and conversion thresholds, and allows generating performance summaries.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders a shopping cart checkout page showing cart items with quantity controls and totals, then initiates a Razorpay payment flow on submission. Redirects to a success or failure page based on the payment outcome.
frontend/src/pages/ContentCalendarPage.t: Displays a monthly calendar grid with scheduled social media posts grouped by day, supporting navigation between months. Allows creating and editing posts via a modal form, with data fetched and mutated through React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying lead/service stats, quick action navigation links, automation status, and recent webhook logs for the Quick Bee AI Growth Engine platform.
frontend/src/pages/DataExportPage.tsx: Data export page allowing users to download app data (leads, services, configs, logs) in multiple formats (JSON, CSV, Excel, PDF) via per-category export cards with format selection dropdowns.
frontend/src/pages/DigitalMarketingAnaly: Analytics page aggregating ad campaign and email campaign data into KPI cards, a bar chart of ad spend/clicks by platform, and a pie chart of email campaign status distribution.
frontend/src/pages/EmailCampaignsPage.ts: CRUD page for managing email marketing campaigns, showing status-based stats and a list of campaigns with create/edit modal and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ExternalToolsPage.tsx: Informational page listing external third-party tools (Zapier, Make, Buffer, etc.) with descriptions and use cases, plus a step-by-step guide for connecting them via webhooks.
Displays a page for receiving and inspecting external webhook logs, showing the receiver endpoint URL with a copy button, and allowing users to refresh or clear all logged webhook entries.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPagesPage.tsx: Manages marketing landing pages with create, edit, and delete functionality, displaying pages in a list with status badges (active/paused/draft) and summary stats.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Provides a CRM-style leads management page with a modal form for creating/editing leads, status color coding, and support for grid/list view toggling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple error page shown after a failed payment, offering buttons to retry checkout or return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirmation page shown after a successful payment that clears the cart, triggers a payment automation event, and displays a generated invoice reference number.
frontend/src/pages/SalesConfigPage.tsx: Configuration page for managing sales-related API keys and webhook URLs (OpenAI, WhatsApp, Razorpay, email, CRM, etc.) with toggle switches, secret masking, connection status badges, and webhook test functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SEOManagerPage.tsx: Manages SEO entries (meta titles, descriptions, keywords) for pages, with create/edit/delete modals and stats showing total pages, keywords, and fully optimized entries.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceManagementPage: Admin page for managing services (create, edit, delete, duplicate, reorder) with a modal form supporting packages, add-ons, categories, and visibility toggles.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesCatalogPage.t: Customer-facing services catalog page with category filtering, a service preview modal for selecting packages and add-ons, and cart integration.
frontend/src/pages/SmartTaskAgentPage.ts: AI-assisted task management page where users enter goals to auto-generate task lists, with support for completing, editing, deleting, and prioritizing tasks stored locally.
frontend/src/pages/SocialMetricsPage.tsx: Social media metrics dashboard displaying KPI totals and bar charts aggregated by platform, with CRUD operations and filtering by platform and date range.
frontend/src/pages/SocialSchedulerPage.t: Social media post scheduler page with grid/list views, platform and status filtering, and CRUD operations for managing posts across multiple platforms.
frontend/src/pages/WebhookLogsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable table of webhook log entries with options to refresh or clear logs, supporting filtering by tool name and success/error status.
frontend/src/utils/aiClient.ts: Sends chat completion requests to a configured AI API endpoint using credentials from salesConfig, logs each call via webhookLogger, and returns the assistant's response text.
frontend/src/utils/automationConfig.ts: Defines and persists a set of boolean automation feature flags (e.g., whatsappAutoReply, leadFollowUp) to localStorage with get/save helpers.
frontend/src/utils/automationTrigger.ts: Fires a POST webhook to the configured automation URL when a named automation is enabled, attaching event metadata and logging the result.
frontend/src/utils/campaignAutopilotStor: Manages localStorage persistence for Campaign Autopilot configuration including posting windows, health thresholds, and summary schedule, with helpers to add/remove windows and sort posts by schedule.
frontend/src/utils/downloadHelper.ts: Provides browser-side file download utilities for JSON, CSV, and Excel (SpreadsheetML) formats, with nested-object flattening and BigInt serialization support.
frontend/src/utils/mockAnalyticsData.ts: Generates randomized mock analytics data (sessions, users, revenue, traffic sources, top pages) for a given date range, used for UI development and testing.
frontend/src/utils/razorpayCheckout.ts: Dynamically loads the Razorpay SDK and opens a payment checkout modal using the configured Razorpay key, invoking success or failure callbacks based on the result.
frontend/src/utils/salesConfig.ts: Defines the SalesConfig interface with API keys, webhook URLs, and per-field enable toggles, persisting and retrieving the configuration from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/taskStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD utilities for a Smart Task Agent, managing goals and tasks with operations like add, update, delete, reorder, and priority-based next-task suggestion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/src/utils/webhookLogger.ts: Logs webhook call results (tool name, URL, payload summary, status code) to localStorage, keeping up to 500 entries, with functions to retrieve and clear logs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state for 'Quick Bee AI Growth Engine', recording two existing features (enabling all automation flags by default, adding PDF-sourced services) and two pending action requests mirroring those features.
